author: sbutler
msg: Make tree conflict tests check unversioned/nonexistent victims by default

author: sussman
msg: Add mod_dav_svn support for a 'public' rev-path query syntax:
Note the trailing slash on the directory;  that's a webdav requirement
we've been enforcing for years (via 301 redirects.)
string on REGULAR public URIs;  if parseable, treat resource just

author: sbutler
msg: Add a recursion scenario to the 'svn info' tree conflict tests.  Fails
because my hack for info on nonexistent victims doesn't work for the
recursive case.  The recursion finds only victims that have entries.

author: dongsheng
msg: * subversion/po/zh_CN.po: Update to r34061, translate some new strings.

author: julianfoad
msg: Make the tree conflicts WC API more consistent.
- When appending log commands to a stringbug, take a pointer-to-pointer
and allocate a new buffer if required, like other loggy functions do.
- Remove the suffix "_data" from the function names.
(svn_wc_add_tree_conflict): ... this, and improve the doc string.
(svn_wc__loggy_del_tree_conflict): ... this, and add a level of indirection
(svn_wc__loggy_add_tree_conflict): ... this, and add a level of indirection
(svn_wc__del_tree_conflict): ... this, and adjust for the other changes.
(svn_wc_add_tree_conflict): ... this, and adjust for the other changes.
(svn_wc__loggy_del_tree_conflict): ... this, and add a level of indirection
(svn_wc__loggy_add_tree_conflict): ... this, and add a level of indirection
